content: materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 350 g color no 618 dark beige 150 g color no 4050 lilac 100 g color no 6360 blue mix 100 g color no 8105 lavender 100 g color no 4434 purple mix 100 g color no 6347 blue/purple 100 g color no 100 off-white drops crochet hook size 6 mm / us j/10 or size need to obtain the correct gauge crochet gauge 1 hexagon should measure 19 cm / 7½ from corner to corner
